introduction: Feature-length documentary following members of The Vienna Boys' Choir as they embark on their ambitious' Silk Road 'project, a children's opera based on original songs from Turkey, Uzbekistan, Pakistan, Tajikistan, Mongolia and China. After nearly a year of rehearsals the choir take to the actual Silk Road to perform the piece in diverse and exotic locations including an antique theatre in Turkey, on Samarkand's Registan and in the Taklamakan desert.
